name: servicerunner/li3_assetic
description: Bring the power of Assetic to the Lithium Framework

suggest.leafo/lessphp: Assetic provides the integration with the lessphp LESS compiler
suggest.leafo/scssphp: Assetic provides the integration with the scssphp SCSS compiler
suggest.ptachoire/cssembed: Assetic provides the integration with phpcssembed to embed data uris
suggest.leafo/scssphp-compass: Assetic provides the integration with the SCSS compass plugin
